评论概述: Breaks the rules of the good, fast, cheap triangle.
评论详情: You can have all three with this one These are very durable, functional, and stylish shirts for sub 20 bucks that arrived in 3 days. GOOD,FAST,CHEAP! I love the dual pockets. One with a pen holder and another for a notebook. I own 20 of these shirts and i have only had one rip. I love the look of them and so do my customers. I would wear these in a formal setting or an office if I had to.  The 70 poly/30 cotton blend is highly resistant to staining and chemical damage such as acid and chlorine. I have not had the fabric degrade or stain from acid or chlorine. I work those chems with every day since I bought them a year ago.  They do much better than cotton shirts for grease and oil resistance unless it is very dirty grease or you get a soak thru of it. But if you brush the shirt against greasy vehicle frames,or you have fresh lubricants get on it, those stains lift very well in a washing machine with tide.
The sizing was perfect and the material feels good.  I've really grown to like the Red Kap brand.

评论概述: Blue Kap's Tech Shirt with a Luminous Twist: Safety First and Fashion... Maybe Second?
类型: Size: 3X-Large TallColor: Navy With Yellow/Green Visibility Trim
评论详情: Hello, intrepid fashion enthusiasts and safety gear aficionados!  Today, we're exploring the "Blue Kap Men's Performance Tech Long Sleeve Shirt with a Reflective Yellow Stripe." That's right—it's not just any shirt; it's a dual-purpose beacon of both style and visibility!  👔 **First Impressions:** This shirt's blue hue is deep and commanding, with a reflective yellow stripe encircling the waist that virtually shouts, "Safety, but make it fashion!" Ideal for those who've ever wanted their presence known, whether at a crowded event or in a low-visibility situation.  📏 **Fit and Comfort:** The fit is a curious puzzle—part snug, part spacious, as if the shirt can't decide whether it's in relaxation or alert mode. It's perfect for anyone who enjoys a garment that keeps them guessing, offering a mix of "just right" in some spots and "what’s happening here?" in others.  🛠 **Performance:** While it sports the title "Performance Tech," don't expect it to charge your phone or stream music. Its standout tech feature is the reflective stripe, which seems designed more for catching headlights than data streams. If you ever find yourself needing to flag down a rescue party during a hike, this shirt has got your back—literally.  👍 **Positives:** - The long sleeves are great for cooler days, and the reflective stripe is perfect for early morning jogs or late-night dog walks. It’s like wearing a caution sign, but in the chicest way possible. - Breathable fabric ensures comfort and airiness, allowing not just airflow but also curious glances to pass through effortlessly.  👎 **Drawbacks:** - This shirt might leave wearers questioning its identity: Is it a casual work shirt or part of a safety uniform? It's a line that's as blurred as it is reflective. - Embraces wrinkles with the enthusiasm of a grandparent at a family reunion. Be prepared to either iron or adopt a laid-back approach to creases.  🎭 **Conclusion:** The Blue Kap Men's Performance Tech Long Sleeve Shirt with a Reflective Yellow Stripe secures a solid three stars for its fusion of functionality and visibility. It's not quite what you'd wear to a gala, but it's definitely what you'd choose for visibility at a gala-sized outdoor event. So light up your wardrobe with this luminous piece and enjoy being both seen and slightly misunderstood!  Stay visible and versatile, everyone!
Hubby says it's a shirt he can relax in. We'll worth the purchase

类型: Size: 3X-Large TallColor: Navy With Yellow/Green Visibility Trim
评论详情: I will be ordering more

I ordered a few of these shirts, starting out with a large extra tall. I'm 6'6" and figured I'd need it. Next one was a large extra tall. The last one was just a large. Based on my experience, unless you're about 7' tall and weigh about 300 lbs., a large will do just fine.  the shirts are well made, very durable, and will last forever. Unless you are a diesel mechanic and always up to your elbows in grease and old motor oil. I would imagine that then they would become stained. But, for me, I will never need another shop shirt. The four that I have now will probably outlast me.  Good purchase. Five stars.
